title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 17 November 2012 - XWiki
content:

07:04 <crocket> Can I define a component without a role?

10:11 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
10:33 <mrvanes> has joined #xwiki  
10:47 <crocket> hey guys  
10:47 <crocket> https://project.snowberry.me/projects/xwikiobjectsort/activity  
10:52 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
10:52 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
10:53 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
11:30 <crocket> How can I instantiate a component via @Inject?  
11:30 <crocket> @Inject seems to be incompatible with new.  
11:31 <vmassol> !search component module  
11:31 <vmassol> crocket: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Component+Module  
11:49 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
11:54 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
12:01 <crocket> vmassol, it seems http://maven.xwiki.org/site/docs/xwiki-javadoc-4.2.x/org/xwiki/component/manager/ComponentManager.html#getInstance(java.lang.reflect.Type) requires a default constructor.  
12:02 <crocket> A default constructor without any argument.  
12:09 <crocket> I'm building ObjectSort component.  
12:15 <crocket> I got an error while building components, "/home/elisa/git-mine/xwikiobjectsort/src/main/java/org/xwiki/sort/internal/DefaultObjectSort.java:[77,43] error: diamond operator is not supported in -source 1.6"  
12:18 <crocket> [ERROR] /home/elisa/git-mine/xwikiobjectsort/src/main/java/org/xwiki/sort/ObjectSort.java:[23,24] error: package com.xpn.xwiki.api does not exist  
12:55 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
12:58 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
13:02 <crocket> Please refer to https://project.snowberry.me/issues/4  
13:02 <crocket> I can't build my XWiki components.  
13:06 <crocket> https://project.snowberry.me/issues/5  
13:11 <crocket> https://project.snowberry.me/issues/7 is the final version.  
13:30 <crocket> When I try to build my maven project, I see "error: package com.xpn.xwiki.api does not exist"  
13:31 <crocket> Can anybody run "git clone git://project.snowberry.me/xwikiobjectsort.git" and see what's wrong in my maven project?  
14:08 <crocket> [INFO] Unable to find resource 'org.xwiki.commons:xwiki-commons-core:jar:4.3-milestone-1' in repository central (http://repo1.maven.org/maven2)  
14:08 <polx> has quit  
14:15 <crocket> The jar file for xwiki-commons-core is missing in maven repository.  
14:20 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
14:22 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
14:22 <crocket> Oh no  
14:22 <crocket> xwiki-commons-core jar is missing in every repository.  
14:22 <crocket> I need access to com.xpn.xwiki.api.Object.  
14:23 <vmassol> has quit  
14:24 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:24 <crocket> I need access to com.xpn.xwiki.api.Object in my componenets.  
14:25 <crocket> xwiki-commons-core seems to contain it, but it doesn't have a jar file in any maven repository.  
15:23 <abusenius> has quit  
16:03 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
16:05 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
16:06 <polx> has quit  
16:54 <crocket> ok  
16:54 <crocket> I have a working codebase of ObjectSort.  
16:55 <crocket> The problem now is to document it and publish it.
